messages.title: WHO IS REALLY ON YOUR SIDE?
messages.content: Dealing with Brexit: Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats - Leading the fight to Stop Brexit. Independence chaos: Stop the divide and chaos of independence. A plan for the future: Investing in schools, mental health, and tackling the climate emergency.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Leading the fight to Stop Brexit.
Stop the divide and chaos of independence.
Investing in schools, mental health, and tackling the climate emergency.

quotes.text: The SNP have let Scotland down. It's time to build a brighter future
